Java - JVM Engineer Job Description: The JVM Engineer is responsible to enhance and optimize Java / JVM on AMD x86 processors. JVM engineer is also expected to identify opportunities to optimize especially JVM through regular performance analysis , competitive studies , latest research trends and implementing these opportunities. The opportunities could be in compilers (JIT) , interpreters , GC , runtime in JVM. JVM Engineers are expected to be self driven and motivated to deliver best java / JVM performance on AMD x86 processors. He / she should be a good team player and expected to work with other performance team in AMD. Job Duties: Following are the responsibilities of the JVM Engineer Own or co - own major JVM optimizations that goes into Java / JVM Propose design , defend and implement complex optimization passes Review code changes and design proposals from team members Should be a key contributor and be able to influence both tactical and strategic directions. Should be a technical evangelist and be able to work with / influence the customers , as and when needed. Mentor and grow technical talent in the organization Contribute to the technical content of the compiler documentation / manuals , blogs / articles , product collaterals Work closely with relevant opensource community to submit patches and other community activities Generate a formal Performance Analysis report on performance issues , analysis and quantified improvement in performance. Develop a close working relationship other performance teams in AMD Qualifications / Experience : BS and 10+ years , MS and 8+ years or PhD and 4+ years in compiler development Hands - on proven experience with atleast one Java / JVM compiler is a must Excellent working experience with one or more commercial or open source compilers Excellent knowledge of micro - architectural features of modern microprocessors (eg; x86 , ARM) Excellent programming / debugging skills including at the Assembly level Prior experience with performance analysis of programs , tuning and extensive experience with one or more profiling / analysis tools like JProf etc Prior experience with ARM and / or x86 target code generation a plus.
